message.raw:
Change to setup_logging.py to use the program name to determine the log location.
Tries to import the relevant program's __init__ module to look at the __file__
attribute. Includes a hack to convert to lower case in the case that the module
was specified in all caps (as in BLACS).
message.html:

Tries to import the relevant program's init module to look at the file
attribute. Includes a hack to convert to lower case in the case that the module
was specified in all caps (as in BLACS).

message:
Change to setup_logging.py to use the program name to determine the log location.
Tries to import the relevant program's __init__ module to look at the __file__
attribute. Includes a hack to convert to lower case in the case that the module
was specified in all caps (as in BLACS).
